scripts.build: cd code-rs && cargo build --release --bin code --bin code-tui --bin code-exec
scripts.build:dev: cd code-rs && cargo build --bin code --bin code-tui --bin code-exec
scripts.test:local: if [ -d code-rs ]; then (cd code-rs && cargo run -p code-cli -- --version); elif [ -d codex-cli ]; then (cd codex-cli && npm link && codex --version); else echo 'no CLI workspace found' >&2; exit 1; fi
scripts.fix: cargo fmt && cargo fix --allow-dirty && cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty
